abstract: Tennessee fires men's basketball coach Donnie Tyndall after one season amid NCAA investigation into alleged violations during Tyndall's prior coaching job.
lead_paragraph: Tyndall is being investigated by the N.C.A.A. over his stay at Southern Mississippi, and Tennessee Athletic Director Dave Hart said it was “highly likely” that Tyndall would face “significant penalties.”

headline.main: Tennessee Fires Donnie Tyndall as Basketball Coach

snippet: Tyndall is being investigated by the N.C.A.A. over his stay at Southern Mississippi, and Tennessee Athletic Director Dave Hart said it was “highly likely” that Tyndall would face “significant penalties.”
